text: Alan Lee Keyes (born August 7, 1950) is a conservative American political activist, author, and former diplomat, and candidate for public office. He ran for President of the United States in 1996, 2000, and 2008, and was a Republican nominee for the U.S. Senate in 1988, 1992, and 2004. ==References== Category:Harvard University alumni Category:1996 United States presidential candidates Category:2000 United States presidential candidates Category:2008 United States presidential candidates Category:Politicians from New York City Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:American political activists Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Alan Keyes
